tripleplay.game.trans

Class InterpedTransition<T extends InterpedTransition<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • tripleplay.game.trans.AbstractTransition<T>
      • tripleplay.game.trans.InterpedTransition<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScreenStack.Transition
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FadeTransition, FlipTransition, PageTurnTransition, SlideTransition

    public abstract class InterpedTransition<T extends InterpedTransition<T>>
extends AbstractTransition<T>
    Handles shared code for transitions that use an interpolation.
